name: Adia Digital Art Co., Ltd.
overview:
Adia Digital Art Co., Ltd. is a visual art studio based in Nanjing, China, focused on providing broadband art outsourcing solutions to video game developers and animation studios worldwide.

Established in 2007 by industry veteran Yaming Di, Adia was built on over 14 years of experience on the client side both directing art for AAA titles and managing the overseas outsourcing relationships on a day-to-day basis. At the time many developers worldwide still hestiated when it came to outsourcing art, of all things, to China, and Adia was born with the mission to deliver the most reliable, checkable, flexible, and recommendable outsourcing pipeline the world has yet to see.
